patthana15.84:4.1: Saraṇaṃ micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.84:5.1: Araṇaṃ sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.84:6.1: Araṇaṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.84:6.2: Araṇaṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
